meanings.definition: A type of camera lens that magnifies distant objects.
meanings.sent1: I used my telephotos to capture a clear image of the bird in the tree.
meanings.sent2: Photographers often rely on telephotos to take pictures of wildlife from afar.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel thought my telephotos were a strange eye following it around.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like telephotos, zooming in on every detail of the painting.
meanings.sent5: With telephotos, you can bring the moon closer than ever before.

meanings.definition: The practice or art of taking photographs from a distance using a telephoto lens.
meanings.sent1: Learning about telephotos helped me improve my wildlife photography skills.
meanings.sent2: Telephotos require a steady hand to capture sharp images from a distance.
meanings.sent3: The spy in the movie used telephotos to secretly capture important information.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for telephotos was evident in the stunning landscapes she captured.
meanings.sent5: Using telephotos, he painted pictures with light and shadows in the distance.
